snippet: Gary Friedman, responsible for invigorating changes at Restoration Hardware over the past decade, has now decided to turn considerable resources toward disruptions in the contemporary art market and beyond.
abstract: Gary Friedman, responsible for invigorating changes at Restoration Hardware over the past decade, has now decided to turn considerable resources toward disruptions in the contemporary art market and beyond.

headline.main: A Home Furnishings Visionary Takes On High Culture
